Question: Who is the founder of ZIES?
What is {Founder} role in ZIES?
English Version 1: What position does {Founder} hold in ZIES?
Hinglish Version 1: {Founder} ka ZIES me kya role hai?
Hinglish Version 3: ZIES me {Founder} ki kya position hai?
Answer: {Founder} is the Founder & Director of ZIES, leading initiatives to enhance educational collaborations.

Question: Is {Founder} involved in AI 360 conference?
English Version 1: Does {Founder} have a role in AI 360?
Hinglish Version 1: Kya {Founder} AI 360 conference me shamil hain?
Hinglish Version 2: Kya {Founder} AI 360 me koi role nibha rahi hain?
